# Dopterae
Nomadic mothfolk with an unknown homeworld, bringing their love of stories and legends wherever they may roam.
## Species Traits - Damage Resistances: Cold -30% - Damage Weaknesses: Heat +20% - Species Accent: Prolonged z's - Special Diet: Can only eat fruits and fabrics (e.g. clothes, plushies) - Improved acceleration in zero-gravity environments thanks to their wings
## Naming Traditions Dopterae are very fond of borrowing naming structures from the many species they may interact with. Some dopterae might blend a given name in the style of a local language with an evocative compound word of their own design as a surname, typically with a focus on nature or art.
Examples: - Erika Heartsong - Azad Everdew - Vivida Nightwish
